page.title: 14Annual Flower Show
page.content: The Horticultural Society was first started in 1904. This year there are 25 members. For 81 years there has been a Baltonsborough Annual Flower Show. They show flowers, fruit and vegetables. There are other attractions such as football and tug of war, majorettes and a band. There are side-shows, a dog show, a gymkhana, a parade of vintage cars and a fancy dress competition. There are 175 categories and last year there were over 900 entries.As prizes the adults get Â£1.50-Â£1.75 and a cup. The children get 50p_20p_10p. The Flower Show tent peg has been knocked into a water pipe twice. In 1979,to celebrate the 75th show, people dressed in Edwardian Costume.
